Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Necklace
Description: Necklace composed of fifty-seven rectangular mother-of-pearl plates of various sizes. Pierced at both extremities, they could be assembled in a variety of manners together with coloured beads to create necklaces and bracelets. This type of jewellery is frequently found in Lower Nubia in C-Group graves and, more rarely, at Kerma.
